name: export-spirits-v5
description: Export - Cross-border air cargo transfer with GPS tracking and insurance
instruction:
Record the international export with premium transport conditions.

Key information to capture:
- Exporter name (FIRST FIELD - used for identity display)
- Transfer date
- From entity (previous holder)
- Origin and final destination countries
- Batch number and bottle range
- Number of bottles and total volume
- Storage conditions during transport
- Quality check status
- Transport method (air cargo flight details)
- GPS tracking status
- Insurance value and currency
- Export license with CID for audit
- Customs declaration with CID for audit
- Air waybill with CID for audit
- Transfer notes

This step records premium international transport with full insurance and tracking.
resource: Example: Golden Dragon Spirits, Hong Kong receives 150 bottles (range 1-150) from La Maison du Whisky, Paris on April 5, 2024. Air cargo Paris → Hong Kong, Flight AF129, GPS tracked throughout journey. Climate maintained at 18°C in secured container. Insurance coverage €180,000 EUR. Export license FR-EXP-SPIRITS-2024-0405, customs declaration EU-CUSTOMS-SPIRITS-B47-150, air waybill AF-AWB-2024-0405-MAC25. Premium selection for Chinese collectors market.
